name: It is not a lie
description:
It is not a lie is a misterious detective game in which you have to solve the horrible crime, that happened on two persons happiest day of their life!

This game was made in 1 week by a team of 7 people

-Triplemovement

-DaKing

-Diagno

-Frostali

-That-Guy

-ItsZoe

-OddActions
